faqs.question: How do I reset my password?
faqs.answer: To reset your password, go to the login page and click on 'Forgot Password'. Follow the instructions sent to your email to reset your password.

faqs.question: How can I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can contact customer support via email at support@company.com or call us at 123-456-7890. Our support team is available from 9 AM to 5 PM, Monday to Friday.

faqs.question: What are your business hours?
faqs.answer: Our business hours are from 9 AM to 5 PM, Monday to Friday.

faqs.question: How do I track my order?
faqs.answer: To track your order, go to the 'Orders' section in your account dashboard and click on the 'Track Order' button next to the relevant order.

faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: Our return policy allows you to return items within 30 days of receipt. Items must be in original condition and packaging. Contact customer support to initiate a return.

faqs.question: How do I update my account information?
faqs.answer: To update your account information, log in to your account and go to the 'Account Settings' section. Here, you can update your personal information, email, and password.

faqs.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer international shipping. Shipping costs and delivery times vary depending on the destination. Please refer to our shipping policy page for more details.

faqs.question: How can I cancel my order?
faqs.answer: To cancel your order, contact our customer support team as soon as possible. If the order has not yet been processed, we will cancel it for you.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept major credit cards, PayPal, and other payment methods as listed on our checkout page.

faqs.question: How do I apply a discount code?
faqs.answer: To apply a discount code, enter the code in the 'Discount Code' field at checkout and click 'Apply'. The discount will be applied to your order total.

faqs.question: Can I change my shipping address after placing an order?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can change your shipping address by contacting our customer support team as soon as possible. Address changes are only possible if the order hasn't been shipped yet.

faqs.question: How do I subscribe to your newsletter?
faqs.answer: You can subscribe to our newsletter by entering your email address in the newsletter signup form at the bottom of our homepage and clicking 'Subscribe'.

faqs.question: Is it safe to shop on your website?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard SSL encryption to protect your personal and payment information. Your security is our top priority.

faqs.question: What should I do if I receive a damaged item?
faqs.answer: If you receive a damaged item, please contact our customer support within 48 hours of delivery with photos of the damage. We will assist you with a replacement or refund.

faqs.question: Do you offer gift cards?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer digital gift cards in various denominations. You can purchase them directly from our Gift Cards page.

faqs.question: How do I delete my account?
faqs.answer: To delete your account, please contact our customer support team. Account deletion is permanent and cannot be undone.

faqs.question: Can I place an order over the phone?
faqs.answer: Yes, our customer support team can assist you with placing an order over the phone during our business hours.

faqs.question: How do I leave a product review?
faqs.answer: After purchasing a product, you'll receive an email invitation to review it. You can also leave a review by visiting the product page and clicking on 'Write a Review'.

faqs.question: What should I do if I forget my account email?
faqs.answer: If you forget the email associated with your account, please contact customer support and provide your full name and order details to verify your identity.

faqs.question: Can I reorder a previous purchase?
faqs.answer: Yes, log in to your account, go to the 'Order History' section, and click 'Reorder' next to the relevant past order.
